root.name: Incantation
root.description: StoryIncantation is a game with an incredibly simple story: Play as a young boy wizard to defeat some evil. GameplayThe game is an action side-scroller set in a medieval fantasy world. The boy wizard you play as carries a large wand that has different projectiles based upon what power-ups you've picked up. The goal of each level is to find three golden feathers to then pass a gate and fight a boss, thus ending the level.
